name: Meowtime
description:
Pass an interesting match-3 puzzle to get a collection of kittens, pick up funny accessories for them, equip their house and join with other players in the town where you can help each other!

The game features:

● Many attractive levels: lots of colorful fun, boosters and exciting mechanics!
● Easy to play but challenging to master!
● Lots of kittens, accessories and interior items - set this mewing world as you want!
● The game is available both online and offline. Play wherever you want!
● Play alone or unite with friends and other players in the towns where you can give each other lives and get new rewards together!

Kittens are waiting for you in Meowtime!
